name: Mama So Fast
description:
Mama so fast was born out of a contest to create a puzzle game and get a 3k or 5k grant, I don't remember. We had around a week left before the deadline so I proposed to consider it a game jam. This is the result, a game based on the fear of latino kids regarding their mother's "chanclas" (flip flops). 

The game's objective is to clean your room before the turns you have alloted run out.
